verses.text: Ach to jelan ach t'a oval, Â¿tas yuj tzik'chaanh a b'ha t'a a chukal? Ha swach'k'olal Dios aynhejek' t'a smasanil tiempo.
Anhej chukal a gana tza k'ulej. Ha a ti' tzak'lab'ej t'a lolonel manh yeloc, icha val junok q'uen cuchilub' te jay ye syak'lab'ej junok anima smil-lab'oc.
Ha chukal a gana t'a yichanh wach'il. Ha lolonel es a gana t'a yichanh lolonel yel.
Ach anima chab' sat, a val lolonel yic tz'ixtan anima a gana.
Palta ha Dios ol ach satanel t'a junelnhej. Ol och yub'naj t'ayach, ol ach yik'ancanel t'a a pat, ol yik'anel a q'uinal.
Ha eb' sk'anab'ajan Dios ol yil jun tik eb', ol xiv eb' t'ay, palta ol b'uchvaj eb' t'a jun winh chuk chi'.
Ol yalan eb': Ilec val winh maj ak'anoch Dios yipoc sk'ool. Anhej val t'a nivac b'eyumal ix yak'och sk'ol winh, aynhejoch spensar winh sk'ulan chukal, xcham eb'.
Ha inxo tik, lajan in icha junok te' olivo te yaax, wach' sq'uib' t'a yamaq'uil stemplo Dios. Anhej swach'k'olal Dios ol vak'och yipoc in k'ool.
Ach in Diosal, ol vak'nhej yuj diosal yuj a wach'k'olal t'ayin. Tzach vak'nhejoch yipoc in k'ool yujto wach' ach. Ol valel ab'ixal t'a yichanh eb' icxo, to toxonton wach' ach.
